Package xxl.core.util.reflect

This package contains useful utilities that need the reflection mechanisms of java sdk 1.3 or higher (dynamic proxies).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Logger
    This class provides a general Logger that can be used with every interface.
    Reflections
    This class provides some static methods which make heavily use of the Java reflection mechanism.
    RuntimeExtender
    This class allows to extend a class at runtime in order to have a MetaData field and matching setter and getter-methods.
    RuntimeExtender.ExtenderClassLoader
    Subclass of ClassLoader needed to call the protected methos definaClass.
    SocketProxy
    This class provides a general Proxy that can be used with every interface.
    SynchronizedWrapper
    This class wraps a given Object that implements a known interface, so that all Methods become synchronized.
    TestFramework
    This framework allows it to write applications which are easily parameterizable via command line options.

Package xxl.core.util.reflect Description

This package contains useful utilities that need the reflection mechanisms of java sdk 1.3 or higher (dynamic proxies).

The classes are very powerful, but sometimes slow. So, do not use the classes if you need ultimate performance.
